idea-plugin.name: siren
idea-plugin.description:
A Simple Renderer for Mermaid diagrams (Siren).
Key Features: - Support for .mermaid and .mmd file formats - Integrated Mermaid diagram editor powered by mermaid.js v11.8.1 - Zoom in/out capability for diagram viewing - Simple and lightweight design
